1.name: College of Arts and Languages
1.description: It fosters the professional growth and development of graduate students of the University through the promotions of the intellectual, social, spiritual, cultural and physical well-being.

2.name: Caregiver Department
2.description: To uphold and protect the freedom of the press at the campus and promote the development and growth of campus journalism as a means of strengthening ethical values, encouraging critical and creative thinking and developing moral characters and personal discipline of the Filipino Youth. University Scribe is the official student publication of the Urdaneta City University. In its 10 years of existence under its current name and adviser, The University Scribe has striven to be on top of its game and has made a legacy through bagging various awards in the annual Regional Higher Educational Press Conference (RHEPC) and Luzon-wide Higher Education Press Conference (LHEPC).
